body_html: The same problem occurred when I was running the cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py script with the device placement logging turned on. I have no idea what do you mean when you say "I must have accidentally built the python package without the "--config=cuda" flag", can you tell which python package you rebuilt?

body: The same problem occurred when I was running the cifar10_multi_gpu_train.py script with the device placement logging turned on. I have no idea what do you mean when you say "I must have accidentally built the python package without the "--config=cuda" flag", can you tell which python package you rebuilt?
